summary: Completed code analysis and backend testing for RouteCast weather app. Verified UI overhaul implementation with location auto-detect, User Guide screen, and feature navigation structure.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Geocoding service not configured - returns 400 for location queries

Endpoint returns 404 - may need API key configuration

passed_tests: User Guide screen code structure verified
Route screen with Guide button verified
Location auto-detect implementation verified in all feature screens
Boondockers feature screens exist (free-camping, dump-station, etc.)
Tractor Trailer feature screens exist (truck-stops, truck-parking, etc.)

action_item_for_main_agent: Configure API keys (MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN, GOOGLE_API_KEY) in backend/.env to enable geocoding and location services. Fix container file watcher limits to enable Expo app startup for full UI testing.

success_percentage.backend: 33% (2/6 endpoints working - basic infrastructure functional, location services need API keys)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% code structure verified, 0% runtime testing due to container limitations
